title: quad~
description: The `quad~` object generates a chaotic audio signal based on a quadratic difference equation: `y[n] = a * y[n-1]^2 + b * y[n-1] + c`. It allows control over the signal's output rate (frequency in Hz) and the coefficients `a`, `b`, `c`, as well as the initial value of `y[n-1]`.
